nodes.text: The Trade Federation built a droid factory on Eos. It had a landing pad, command center, power center, manufacturing building, and main factory. Its defenses included a Planetary Gun. It was discovered in 32 BBY by the mercenary Vana Sage after a contract infringement; Sage later joined in a retaliatory strike against the droid factory, destroying it.
The droid factory on Eos appears in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter.
